overview: Mr. Al Smith brings significant leadership experience providing enterprise software and high technology solutions to the market for over 20 years. He has served cross-functional executive roles most recently at IBM and other leading organizations such as Princeton Softech, Hewlett Packard, Bluestone Software and Astea International. He oversees the day to day operating functions of the company - Solution Development, Marketing, Sales, Professional Services and Customer Support as well as responsible for scaling the company to support its growth strategy.
